title: The default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value that was set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter. 
2. Modify the default value. 
3. Check if the modified default value is retained in the list box.
